mapper.select: SELECT l.*, c.name as category_name, u.real_name as user_name FROM lost_item l LEFT JOIN category c ON l.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.id WHERE l.id = #{id}
SELECT l.*, c.name as category_name FROM lost_item l LEFT JOIN category c ON l.category_id = c.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_item (user_id, category_id, title, description, lost_time, lost_location, contact_name, contact_phone, status, views) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{lostTime}, #{lostLocation}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{status}, #{views})
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, lost_time = #{lostTime}, lost_location = #{lostLocation}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lost_item SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lost_item SET views = views + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
